public void testNumberUtils () {
    assertEquals(new BigDecimal("123456789012345678901234567890.123456789"), NumberUtils.createNumber("123456789012345678901234567890.123456789"));
    assertEquals(new BigDecimal("123456789012345678901234567890.123456789"), NumberUtils.createNumber("123456789012345678901234567890.123456789").toString());
}
